Package io.github.cjstehno.testthings.match

Class FileMatcher

java.lang.Object
org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<File>
io.github.cjstehno.testthings.match.FileMatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<File>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public abstract class FileMatcher extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<File>
Matchers useful for matching File information.

    • fileTextMatches

      public static org.hamcrest.Matcher<File> fileTextMatches(org.hamcrest.Matcher<String> stringMatcher)
      Creates a file matcher for matching the content as a string. Multiline content will be joined with line breaks (i.e. "\n").
      Parameters:
      stringMatcher - the string text matcher
      Returns:
      the file matcher
